name: Slack-Twitter
description: Node.js middleware to create a reading and writing Twitter client out of Slack.

TWITTER_ACCESS_TOKEN_KEY.description: Twitter access token key, available from http://apps.twitter.com/

TWITTER_ACCESS_TOKEN_SECRET.description: Twitter access token secret, available from http://apps.twitter.com/

TWITTER_CONSUMER_KEY.description: Twitter consumer key, available from http://apps.twitter.com/

TWITTER_CONSUMER_SECRET.description: Twitter consumer secret, available from http://apps.twitter.com/

SLACK_TOKEN.description: Token for the bot, available from  https://my.slack.com/services/new and under 'DIY Integrations & Customizations' click the 'Add' button.

SLACK_POST_CHANNEL.description: Channel in Slack to post tweets from.

SLACK_TIMELINE_CHANNEL.description: Channel in Slack to post tweets to.
